#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int t;
	cin>>t;
	//0xAAAAAAAA is 32 bit integer whose even positions are 1 and odd positions are 0
	long long int even_bits=t&0xAAAAAAAA;//got all even bits of t
	even_bits=even_bits>>1;//right shift even bits
	//0x55555555 is 32 bit integer whose odd positions are 1 and even postions are 0
	long long int odd_bits=t&0x55555555;//got all odd bits of t
	odd_bits=odd_bits<<1;//left shift odd bits
	//left shift odd bits
	cout<<(even_bits|odd_bits)<<endl;
}
